'''''"Atlatl's Blessing"''''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Duelist: Series I]]''. The achievements are earned by defeating the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Rock-Cavernous Wayob Manifestation|text="Atlatl's Blessing" — Will of Plumes Swift}} while completing challenge conditions.
